subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur took over sole possession of second place on the N.H.L. career list by earning his 95th shutout Sunday, making 30 saves for the Devils in a 1-0 victory in overtime against the host Calgary Flames.
snippet: Martin Brodeur took over sole possession of second place on the N.H.L. career list by earning his 95th shutout Sunday, making 30 saves for the Devils in a 1-0 victory in overtime against the host Calgary Flames.
